text.p: True or False: If [mathjaxinline]W[/mathjaxinline] is a subspace of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline], and the dimension of [mathjaxinline]W[/mathjaxinline] and the dimension of [mathjaxinline]V[/mathjaxinline] are both 8, then [mathjaxinline]W = V[/mathjaxinline].

font.p: This is a direct consequence of one of the propositions on the previous page.
